channel.title: GitHub actions/runner-images Announcement
channel.description: GitHub Actions runner images. Contribute to actions/runner-images development by creating an account on GitHub.

item.title: The Ubuntu 18.04 Actions runner image will begin deprecation on 8/8/22 and will be fully unsupported by 12/1/22
The macOS 10.15 Actions runner image will begin deprecation on 5/31/22 and will be fully unsupported by 8/30/22 in GitHub and by 9/30/22 in ADO
